sentence.text: Recently a homozygous mutation, Gly372Ser, in the release of cytochrome c from mitochondria gene, was reported in an abstract form, in three sibs who suffered from intractable epilepsy and developmental delay accompanied by 3-methylglutaconic aciduria.

entity.text: release of cytochrome c from mitochondria

sentence.text: Given the phenotypic similarity, we conclude that missense mutations in release of cytochrome c from mitochondria are likely manifesting by severe intellectual disability and epilepsy accompanied by 3-methylglutaconic aciduria and variable mitochondrial complex V deficiency.

entity.text: release of cytochrome c from mitochondria
